title: Models don't understand mandatory vs optional target selections
description:
When XMage requires a mandatory target selection (e.g. for a spell on the stack), models try to pass priority or send answer:false instead of selecting a target. They don't understand that some selections are required and cannot be skipped.

Evidence from game_20260209_184021: Models repeatedly try to skip mandatory GAME_TARGET prompts, causing the prompt to reappear and creating loops.

Possible fixes:
- Include a 'required' flag in get_action_choices output when the selection is mandatory
- Add clearer messaging in the MCP layer about mandatory vs optional selections
- Auto-select the only valid target when there's exactly one legal option

Game log: ~/mage-bench-logs/game_20260209_184021/
